full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Contract Title
6D063-235832 Bait Capture Enrichment Panel

### Reference Number
WS4519807534

### Solicitation Number
WS4519807534

### Closing Date and Time
April 30, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EDT

### Amendment Information
 Amendment number: 0
 Amendment date: April 12, 2024

### Public Health Agency of Canada Procurement
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) invites all interested bidders to submit a proposal for the delivery of 1,200 reactions of a Bait Capture Enrichment Panel. The procurement method is competitive and open bidding.

### Contract Requirements
The successful bidder will provide and deliver the required product to the PHAC.

### Key Documents
* Contract Details in English: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19389278?extsite=MTkzODkyNzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19389278?extsite=MTkzODkyNzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Contract Details in French: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19389278?extsite=MTkzODkyNzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19389278?extsite=MTkzODkyNzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Oana Lee at oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Selection Criteria and Preference
The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Relevant Trade Agreements
This procurement is covered under the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)

### Locations
The contract will be delivered to Winnipeg.

### Contracting Office
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and
